text: Gyumri (Armenian:Գյումրի) is the capital and largest city of the Shirak province in northwest Armenia. It is located about 75 miles from the capital Yerevan, and, with a population of 150,917 (2001 census), is the second- largest city in Armenia. == Other websites == * City website * Surp Amenaprkich cathedral in Gyumri Category:Cities in Armenia
title: Gyumri
